mapper.select: select X.ZONE_NUM, X.ZONE_NAME, X.ZONE_LOCATION_X, X.ZONE_LOCATION_Y, X.ZONE_COMMENT from ( select rownum as rnum, A.ZONE_NAME, A.ZONE_NUM, A.ZONE_LOCATION_X, A.ZONE_LOCATION_Y, A.ZONE_COMMENT from ( select ZONE_NAME, ZONE_NUM, ZONE_LOCATION_X, ZONE_LOCATION_Y, ZONE_COMMENT from KHAKIZONE order by ZONE_NUM desc) A where #{idx}+5 >= rownum) X where X.rnum >= #{idx}+1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO khakizone (zone_num, zone_name, zone_location_x,zone_location_y, zone_comment) VALUES(khakizone_seq.nextval,#{zone_name},#{zone_location_x}, #{zone_location_y},#{zone_comment})
